description: Details pursuant to condition 21 (non-residential cycle storage) of Variation of conditions application reference 22/3090 dated 31/03/2023  for Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings and documents), condition 4 (wheelchair accessible units), and condition 18 (CHP details) of full planning permission reference 13/1098 dated 10 February 2017, for Demolition of 205 Church Road and proposal of new market square to replace Eric Road. Demolition of 3 storey building to the rear of 203 Church Road and proposal of 34 residential dwellings and ground floor non-residential space (class A1/A3/B1/D1). Stopping up of Eric Road as revised by plans.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Church Road Car Park rear of 189-203, Church Road, London
